info.title: Digital Asset Management API
info.description: Presents developer entry points to the Digital Asset Management features of HCL DX 9.5

get.description: View reference details of media assets.

200.description: Array of media asset items.

400.description: Returns the bad request error if the input parameters are missing/invalid.

401.description: Returns the unauthorized error if the ltpa token is not sent/invalid/expired.

403.description: Returns the error if you do not have permission to view this

500.description: Returns the internal server error if the portal server is not reachabale.

parameters.name: collection_id
parameters.description: Provide the media asset ID. e.g., 0f06cc1c-bb99-48b3-b8ff-4e5de51b4b54.

parameters.name: media_item_id
parameters.description: Provide the media asset ID. e.g., 0f06cc1c-bb99-48b3-b8ff-4e5de51b4b54.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Provide the offset for pagination (e.g. 0).

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Provide the number of records to be fetched for pagination (e.g. 10).

parameters.name: orderField
parameters.description: Provide the field to order the records.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Provide the ordering way either DESC or ASC.

get.description: This API will retrieve version data as per the provided version id.

200.description: Retrieve versions list.

401.description: Returns the unauthorized error if the ltpa token is not sent/invalid/expired.

500.description: Returns the internal server error if the portal server is not reachabale.

parameters.name: collection_id
parameters.description: Provide the collection ID. e.g., 9d415781-6b65-4077-9e09-00e8e11f16b6.

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: Provide the media asset ID. e.g., 0f06cc1c-bb99-48b3-b8ff-4e5de51b4b54.

parameters.name: rendition_id
parameters.description: Provide the rendition ID. e.g., 0h06cc1c-bb99-48b3-b8ff-4e5de51b4b90.

parameters.name: version_id
parameters.description: Provide the version ID. e.g., 0j06cc1c-bb99-48b3-b8ff-4e5de51b4b59.

parameters.name: binary
parameters.description: To get Binary data set as true or false.

get.description: This API will retrieve versions list as per the provided rendition id.

200.description: Retrieve versions list.

401.description: Returns the unauthorized error if the ltpa token is not sent/invalid/expired.

500.description: Returns the internal server error if the portal server is not reachabale.

parameters.name: collection_id
parameters.description: Provide the collection ID. e.g., 9d415781-6b65-4077-9e09-00e8e11f16b6.

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: Provide the media asset ID. e.g., 0f06cc1c-bb99-48b3-b8ff-4e5de51b4b54.

parameters.name: rendition_id
parameters.description: Provide the rendition ID. e.g., 0h06cc1c-bb99-48b3-b8ff-4e5de51b4b90.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Provide the number of records to be fetched for pagination (e.g. 10).

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Provide the offset for pagination (e.g. 0).

parameters.name: orderField
parameters.description: Provide the field to order the records (e.g. 'created', 'updated', 'version', 'createdBy', 'updatedBy')

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Provide the ordering way either DESC or ASC.

put.description: This API will create new version for the provided rendition id.

200.description: Updates rendition information.

400.description: Returns the bad request error if the input parameters are missing/invalid.

401.description: Returns the unauthorized error if the ltpa token is not sent/invalid/expired.

500.description: Returns the internal server error if the portal server is not reachabale.

parameters.name: collection_id
parameters.description: Provide the collection ID. e.g., 9d415781-6b65-4077-9e09-00e8e11f16b6.

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: Provide the media asset ID. e.g., 0f06cc1c-bb99-48b3-b8ff-4e5de51b4b54.

parameters.name: rendition_id
parameters.description: Provide the rendition ID. e.g., 0h06cc1c-bb99-48b3-b8ff-4e5de51b4b90.

get.description: This API retrieves rendition data as per the provided rendition id.

200.description: Retrieve renditions data.

401.description: Returns the unauthorized error if the ltpa token is not sent/invalid/expired.

500.description: Returns the internal server error if the portal server is not reachabale.

parameters.name: collection_id
parameters.description: Provide the collection ID. e.g., 9d415781-6b65-4077-9e09-00e8e11f16b6.

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: Provide the media asset ID. e.g., 0f06cc1c-bb99-48b3-b8ff-4e5de51b4b54.

parameters.name: rendition_id
parameters.description: Provide the rendition ID. e.g., 0h06cc1c-bb99-48b3-b8ff-4e5de51b4b90.

parameters.name: binary
parameters.description: To get Binary data set as true or false.

parameters.name: thumbnail
parameters.description: OPENAPI_THUMBNAIL_DESCRIPTION

parameters.name: download
parameters.description: To get download data set as true or false. (e.g true).

get.description: This API will retrieve renditions list as per the provided item id.

200.description: Retrieve rendition list.

401.description: Returns the unauthorized error if the ltpa token is not sent/invalid/expired.

500.description: Returns the internal server error if the portal server is not reachabale.

parameters.name: collection_id
parameters.description: Provide the collection ID. e.g., 9d415781-6b65-4077-9e09-00e8e11f16b6.

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: Provide the media asset ID. e.g., 0f06cc1c-bb99-48b3-b8ff-4e5de51b4b54.

parameters.name: download
parameters.description: To get download data set as true or false. (e.g true).

parameters.name: fileName
parameters.description: Provide the download file name. (default: download)

parameters.name: downloadType
parameters.description: Provide the download type. (e.g. 'all', 'rendition' )

put.description: This API will replace item for provided item id.

200.description: Successful response on updating media asset.

400.description: Returns the bad request error if the input parameters are missing/invalid.

401.description: Returns the unauthorized error if the ltpa token is not sent/invalid/expired.

500.description: Returns the internal server error if the portal server is not reachabale.

parameters.name: collection_id
parameters.description: Provide the collection ID. e.g., 9d415781-6b65-4077-9e09-00e8e11f16b6.

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: Provide the media asset ID. e.g., 0f06cc1c-bb99-48b3-b8ff-4e5de51b4b54.

200.description: Updated media asset.

400.description: Returns the bad request error if the input parameters are missing/invalid.

401.description: Returns the unauthorized error if the ltpa token is not sent/invalid/expired.

409.description: Returns the duplicate item found error.

500.description: Returns the internal server error if the portal server is not reachabale.

parameters.name: collection_id
parameters.description: Provide the collection ID. e.g., 9d415781-6b65-4077-9e09-00e8e11f16b6.

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: Provide the media asset ID. e.g., 0f06cc1c-bb99-48b3-b8ff-4e5de51b4b54.

get.description: Retrieve information on the media asset. Also it can retrieve thumbnail or binary data.

200.description: Information on the media asset or thumbnail or binary data.

401.description: Returns the unauthorized error if the ltpa token is not sent/invalid/expired.

500.description: Returns the internal server error if the portal server is not reachabale.

parameters.name: collection_id
parameters.description: Provide the collection ID. e.g., 9d415781-6b65-4077-9e09-00e8e11f16b6.

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: Provide the media asset ID. e.g., 0f06cc1c-bb99-48b3-b8ff-4e5de51b4b54.

parameters.name: binary
parameters.description: To get Binary data set as true or false.

delete.description: Delete a media asset from the specified collection.

401.description: Returns the unauthorized error if the ltpa token is not sent/invalid/expired.

403.description: Returns if no permission to delete the Media Asset.

405.description: Returns if the Media Asset is referenced and cannot be deleted.

500.description: Returns the internal server error if the portal server is not reachabale.

parameters.name: collection_id
parameters.description: Provide the collection ID. e.g., 9d415781-6b65-4077-9e09-00e8e11f16b6.

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: Provide the media asset ID. e.g., 0f06cc1c-bb99-48b3-b8ff-4e5de51b4b54.

parameters.name: ignoreMediaReferences
parameters.description: Setting this to true, will ignore Reference check for the Media Asset

post.description: This API will create a new item.

200.description: Successful response on creating item.

400.description: Returns the bad request error if the input parameters are missing/invalid.

401.description: Returns the unauthorized error if the ltpa token is not sent/invalid/expired.

500.description: Returns the internal server error if the portal server is not reachabale.

parameters.name: collection_id
parameters.description: Provide the collection ID. e.g., 9d415781-6b65-4077-9e09-00e8e11f16b6.

get.description: Retrieve media assets/collections inside collection based on the type with filter criteria.

200.description: Array of media assets/collections under collection retrieved based on the type with filter criteria.

401.description: Returns the unauthorized error if the ltpa token is not sent/invalid/expired.

500.description: Returns the internal server error if the portal server is not reachabale.

parameters.name: collection_id
parameters.description: Provide the collection ID. e.g., 9d415781-6b65-4077-9e09-00e8e11f16b6.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Provide the number of records to be fetched for pagination (e.g. 10).

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Provide the offset for pagination (e.g. 0).

parameters.name: filterAccess
parameters.description: Provide the access way either READ or WRITE.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Specifies the result set to return (collections or items) under a collection.

parameters.name: orderField
parameters.description:
Provide the field to order the records.
This filter will be applied only for type=item

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description:
Provide the ordering way either DESC or ASC.
This filter will be applied only for type=item

items.description: Receive the media asset types, one or more (e.g.[image], [image, video, document]).

parameters.name: isFavorite
parameters.description:
Provide the isFavorites value to filter the favorite records (e.g true).
This filter will be applied only for type=item

200.description: Returns updated collection information.

400.description: Returns the bad request error if the input parameters are missing/invalid.

401.description: Returns the unauthorized error if the ltpa token is not sent/invalid/expired.

500.description: Returns the internal server error if the portal server is not reachabale.

parameters.name: collection_id
parameters.description: Provide the collection ID. e.g., 9d415781-6b65-4077-9e09-00e8e11f16b6.

200.description: Collection PATCH success.

400.description: Returns the bad request error if the input parameters are missing/invalid.

401.description: Returns the unauthorized error if the ltpa token is not sent/invalid/expired.

500.description: Returns the internal server error if the portal server is not reachabale.

parameters.name: collection_id
parameters.description: Provide the collection ID. e.g., 9d415781-6b65-4077-9e09-00e8e11f16b6.

get.description: This GET operation retrieves the Digital Asset Management collection.

200.description: Returns an object containing collection information.

401.description: Returns the unauthorized error if the ltpa token is not sent/invalid/expired.

500.description: Returns the internal server error if the portal server is not reachabale.

parameters.name: collection_id
parameters.description: Provide the collection ID. e.g., 9d415781-6b65-4077-9e09-00e8e11f16b6.

delete.description: This DELETE operation deletes media asset collection.

401.description: Returns the unauthorized error if the ltpa token is not sent/invalid/expired.

403.description: Returns if no permission to delete the Collection.

405.description: Returns if the Media Assets inside the collection are referenced, and cannot be deleted.

500.description: Returns the internal server error if the portal server is not reachabale.

parameters.name: collection_id
parameters.description: Provide the collection ID. e.g., 9d415781-6b65-4077-9e09-00e8e11f16b6.

parameters.name: ignoreMediaReferences
parameters.description: Setting this to true, will ignore Reference Check for the Media Assets in side the Collection.

post.description: This POST operation creates a new media asset collection.

200.description: Returns the details of a newly created collection.

400.description: Returns the bad request error if the input parameters are missing/invalid.

401.description: Returns the unauthorized error if the ltpa token is not sent/invalid/expired.

409.description: Returns the duplicate item found error.

500.description: Returns the internal server error if the portal server is not reachabale.

requestBody.description: This POST operation creates a new media asset collection.

get.description: Retrieve the Digital Asset Management collections based on the filter criteria.

200.description: Array of Digital Asset Management collections retrieved based on the filter criteria.

401.description: Returns the unauthorized error if the ltpa token is not sent/invalid/expired.

500.description: Returns the internal server error if the portal server is not reachabale.

parameters.name: filterAccess
parameters.description: Provide the access way either READ or WRITE.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Provide the number of records to be fetched for pagination (e.g. 10).

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Provide the offset for pagination (e.g. 0).

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Provide the keyword to perform search (e.g digital).

parameters.name: searchType
parameters.description: Provide the search type using any of [ all, name, description ].

items.description: Receive the media asset types, one or more (e.g.[image], [image, video, document]).

post.description: This API will mark media asset as favorite.

200.description: Array of marked favorite media asset.

401.description: Returns the unauthorized error if the ltpa token is not sent/invalid/expired.

403.description: Returns the error if you do not have permission to view this

500.description: Returns the internal server error if the portal server is not reachabale.

get.description: This API will retrieve all the favorite media asset items.

200.description: Array of favorite media asset Items.

400.description: Returns the bad request error if the input parameters are missing/invalid.

401.description: Returns the unauthorized error if the ltpa token is not sent/invalid/expired.

403.description: Returns the error if you do not have permission to view this

500.description: Returns the internal server error if the portal server is not reachabale.

delete.description: This API will unmark media asset item as favorite.

200.description: Array of unmarked favorite media asset Items.

401.description: Returns the unauthorized error if the ltpa token is not sent/invalid/expired.

403.description: Returns the error if you do not have permission to view this

500.description: Returns the internal server error if the portal server is not reachabale.

get.description: The API provides the possibility to search for Digital Asset Management items via search query on the existing meta-data fields using such criteria as name, mime-type, title, keywords, description.

200.description: Array of filtered media asset items.

400.description: Returns the bad request error if the input parameters are missing/invalid.

401.description: Returns the unauthorized error if the ltpa token is not sent/invalid/expired.

403.description: Returns the error if you do not have permission to view this

500.description: Returns the internal server error if the portal server is not reachabale.

parameters.name: collectionId
parameters.description: Provide the collection ID. e.g., 9d415781-6b65-4077-9e09-00e8e11f16b6.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Provide the keyword to perform search (e.g digital).

parameters.name: searchType
parameters.description: Provide the search type using any of [ all, name, description ].

items.description: Receive the media asset types, one or more (e.g.[image], [image, video, document]).
Provide the file extensions without prefixing dot(.) such as png, jpeg, jpg and etc.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Provide the offset for pagination (e.g. 0).

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Provide the number of records to be fetched for pagination (e.g. 10).

parameters.name: orderField
parameters.description: Provide the field to order the records.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Provide the ordering way either DESC or ASC.

parameters.name: isFavorite
parameters.description: Provide the isFavorites value to filter the favorite records (e.g true).

put.description: Replaces full media asset type group in Digital Asset Management.

200.description: Returns updated media asset type group information in Digital Asset Management.

400.description: Returns the bad request error if the input parameters are missing/invalid.

401.description: Returns the unauthorized error if the ltpa token is not sent/invalid/expired.

500.description: Returns the internal server error if the portal server is not reachabale.

parameters.name: mediatypegroup_id
parameters.description: Provide media assetTypeGroup ID (e.g 605b2d27-8767-421b-a941-cf7d0ebc9675).

patch.description: Updates part of the media asset type group in Digital Asset Management.

401.description: Returns the unauthorized error if the ltpa token is not sent/invalid/expired.

500.description: Returns the internal server error if the portal server is not reachabale.

401.description: Returns the unauthorized error if the ltpa token is not sent/invalid/expired.

500.description: Returns the internal server error if the portal server is not reachabale.

parameters.description: Provide media assetTypeGroup ID (e.g 605b2d27-8767-421b-a941-cf7d0ebc9675).

delete.description: Deletes a media asset type group and removes all related media asset types which belonged to this media asset type group in Digital Asset Management.

401.description: Returns the unauthorized error if the ltpa token is not sent/invalid/expired.

parameters.description: Provide media assetTypeGroup ID (e.g 605b2d27-8767-421b-a941-cf7d0ebc9675).

200.description: Returns the details of newly created media asset type group.

400.description: Returns the bad request error if the input parameters are missing/invalid.

401.description: Returns the unauthorized error if the ltpa token is not sent/invalid/expired.

self.description: Specifies the current url where data has been fetched.

isFavorite.description: Provide the isFavorites value to filter the favorite records (e.g true).

thumbnailUrl.description: Specifies the URL to get the binary data for thumbnail of the original rendition.

binaryUrl.description: Specifies the URL to get the binary data for the latest version of the original rendition.

images.description: Specifies images count in the collection.

documents.description: Specifies documents count in the collection.

collections.description: Specifies the collections count in the collection.

items.description: Specifies the total count for items in the collection.
